sentences.chinese: 如果你有失眠症，试试我的简单疗法。

sentences.english: In my insomnia, you have to hold me to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 在我失眠的时候，你要抱着我睡。

sentences.english: I know someone with insomnia who only gets two hours of sleep each night.
sentences.chinese: 我认识一个患有失眠症的人，他每天晚上只能睡上两个小时。

detailed_translations.english: if you suffer from insomnia, you are not able to sleep

sentences.english: She was taken to hospital with serious head injuries.
sentences.chinese: 她头部受重伤被送到医院。

sentences.english: Beckham has missed several games through injury
sentences.chinese: 贝克汉姆因伤错过了几场比赛。

sentences.english: He’s a lawyer who specializes in personal injury claims.
sentences.chinese: 他是个专门从事人身伤害索赔的律师。

detailed_translations.english: a wound or damage to part of your body caused by an accident or attack

sentences.english: A nurse cleaned and bandaged the wound.
sentences.chinese: 护士把伤口清洗包扎好。

sentences.english: It took several months for his wounds to heal .
sentences.chinese: 他的伤口几个月后才愈合。

sentences.english: The doctor said it was only a flesh wound (= one that does not cut the skin very deeply ) .
sentences.chinese: 医生说那只是皮肉伤。

sentences.english: a gaping wound (= one that is wide and open ) on his thigh
sentences.chinese: 他大腿上裂开的伤口

sentences.english: Gunmen killed two people and wounded six others in an attack today.
sentences.chinese: 在今天的一起袭击事件中，持枪歹徒打死两人，打伤六人。

detailed_translations.english: an injury to your body that is made by a weapon such as a knife or a bullet
to injure someone with a knife, gun etc

sentences.english: Her heart was pounding in her chest.
sentences.chinese: 她的心在胸口怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: a hairy chest
sentences.chinese: 毛茸茸的胸部

detailed_translations.english: the front part of your body between your neck and your stomach

sentences.english: Anne’s sight is very good for someone of her age.
sentences.chinese: 安妮的视力对于她这个年龄的人来说算是非常好的。

sentences.english: He began to lose his sight six years ago.
sentences.chinese: 六年前他开始视力衰退。

sentences.english: an emergency operation to save his sight
sentences.chinese: 挽救他视力的紧急手术

sentences.english: You will get a free sight test if you are under 16.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不满16岁，可以免费检查视力。

detailed_translations.english: the physical ability to see
to see something from a long distance away, or see something you have been looking for

sentences.english: He had a problem with his eyesight.
sentences.chinese: 他的视力有问题。

detailed_translations.english: your ability to see

sentences.english: We know how to prevent malaria.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道怎样去阻止疟疾。

sentences.english: The campaign to eradicate malaria did not.
sentences.chinese: 而根除疟疾运动则未做到这一点。

sentences.english: To reach our goal of near zero deaths from malaria by 2015, we need an extraordinary intensification of our actions in two key areas.
sentences.chinese: 我们要想在2015年以前达到疟疾死亡人数近于零的目标，必须格外加强我们在两个关键领域的行动。

detailed_translations.english: a disease that is common in hot countries and that you get when a type of  mosquito  bites you

sentences.english: a support group for parents of disabled children
sentences.chinese: 帮助残障儿童父母的援助团

sentences.english: a severely disabled polio patient
sentences.chinese: 严重残疾的小儿麻痺症病人

sentences.english: teachers who work with learning disabled children (= children who have problems learning )
sentences.chinese: 教有学习障碍的儿童的教师

detailed_translations.english: someone who is disabled cannot use a part of their body properly, or cannot learn easily

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…失去能力（disable的过去分词）

sentences.english: One of the most common symptoms of schizophrenia is hearing imaginary voices.
sentences.chinese: 精神分裂症最常见的症状之一是幻听。

detailed_translations.english: something wrong with your body or mind which shows that you have a particular illness

sentences.english: Andy has a fever and won’t be coming into work today.
sentences.chinese: 安迪发烧了，今天不来上班。

sentences.english: I woke up this morning with a fever and an upset stomach.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上醒来时我发烧了，胃也不舒服。

sentences.english: She’s running a fever (= has a fever ) .
sentences.chinese: 她在发烧。

detailed_translations.english: an illness or a medical condition in which you have a very high temperature

detailed_translations.chinese: 使发烧；使狂热；使患热病

sentences.english: Matthew coughed and cleared his throat.
sentences.chinese: 马修咳了一声清清喉咙。

sentences.english: I think I’m getting a cold or flu – I’ve been coughing and sneezing all day.
sentences.chinese: 我想我是着凉了，或者得了流感——我整天都在咳嗽和打喷嚏。

sentences.english: He’s got a bad cough.
sentences.chinese: 他咳嗽得很厉害。

detailed_translations.english: to suddenly push air out of your throat with a short sound, often repeatedly
a medical condition that makes you cough a lot

sentences.english: Father doctored me for ordinary stomachache.
sentences.chinese: 父亲为我治疗一般的胃痛。

sentences.english: A fever can also affect sleep and dreams, as can a stomachache, which is why some people believe spicy foods or eating right before bed causes wild dreams.
sentences.chinese: 发烧也能影响睡眠和做梦，胃痛也如此，这就是为什么有人相信睡前吃了辛辣的食物会做噩梦。

detailed_translations.english: pain in your stomach or near your stomach

sentences.english: If you have a headache, you should take some aspirin.
sentences.chinese: 要是头痛，你该吃点阿司匹林。

sentences.english: The airline's biggest headache is the increase in the price of aviation fuel.
sentences.chinese: 令航空公司最头疼的问题是航空燃料价格的上涨。

detailed_translations.english: a pain in your head

sentences.english: Sugar is bad for your teeth.
sentences.chinese: 糖对牙齿不好。

detailed_translations.english: one of the hard white objects in your mouth that you use to bite and eat food

sentences.english: I’ve got toothache .
sentences.chinese: 我牙痛。

sentences.english: I had terrible toothache all last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我一整夜牙疼得厉害。

detailed_translations.english: a pain in a tooth

sentences.english: a food allergy
sentences.chinese: 食物过敏

detailed_translations.english: a medical condition in which you become ill or in which your skin becomes red and painful because you have eaten or touched a particular substance

sentences.english: The heat and the champagne made him feel dizzy .
sentences.chinese: 高温和香槟酒使他感到眩晕。

sentences.english: She started to suffer from dizzy spells (= a short period when you feel dizzy ) .
sentences.chinese: 她开始感到一阵阵的眩晕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 晕眩的；使人头晕的；昏乱的；心不在焉的；愚蠢的
detailed_translations.english: feeling unable to stand steadily, for example because you are looking down from a high place or because you are ill

detailed_translations.chinese: 使头晕眼花；使混乱；使茫然

sentences.english: ...a heart surgeon.
sentences.chinese: …一位心脏外科医生。

detailed_translations.english: a doctor who does operations in a hospital

sentences.english: your family physician
sentences.chinese: 你的家庭医生

detailed_translations.english: a doctor

sentences.english: Visit your dentist twice a year for a checkup.
sentences.chinese: 每年看两次牙医做检查。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to treat people’s teeth

sentences.english: All candidates are carefully vetted by Central Office.
sentences.chinese: 所有候选人都由总部仔细审查。

detailed_translations.english: to check someone’s past activities, relationships etc in order to make sure that person is suitable for a particular job, especially an important one
someone who is trained to give medical care and treatment to sick animals

sentences.english: a psychiatric hospital
sentences.chinese: 精神病医院

sentences.english: a psychiatric nurse
sentences.chinese: 精神病院护士

sentences.english: Charles was suffering from a psychiatric disorder (= mental illness ) .
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯彼时精神错乱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精神病学的，精神病治疗的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the study and treatment of mental illness

sentences.english: He and his wife live in North Carolina, where he is a psychiatrist.
sentences.chinese: 他和妻子住在卡罗莱纳州北部，他是一名精神病医生。

sentences.english: Under the new law, then, you could visit a psychiatrist with the same frequency with which you visit your ENT and receive the same level of reimbursement in each case.
sentences.chinese: 然而根据新法，你可以看精神病医师的次数和看眼睛、鼻子和喉咙的次数一样多，而且每次看完之后可以享受同样的报销水平。

sentences.english: “The notion that behavior modification can bring about true happiness is as bogus as can be,” says psychiatrist Charles Goodstein, MD, of New York University.
sentences.chinese: 纽约大学医学博士、精神病学家查尔斯.古德斯坦说：“行为修正能够带来真正的快乐的观念是相当虚假的。”

detailed_translations.english: a doctor trained in the treatment of mental illness

sentences.english: You’ll just have to be patient and wait till I’m off the phone.
sentences.chinese: 你只能耐心点，等我打完电话。

sentences.english: She was tough but wonderful with her patients.
sentences.chinese: 她很严厉，但对病人很好。

detailed_translations.english: able to wait calmly for a long time or to accept difficulties, people’s annoying behaviour etc without becoming angry
someone who is receiving medical treatment from a doctor or in a hospital

sentences.english: an appointment at an outpatient clinic
sentences.chinese: 门诊预约

detailed_translations.english: a place, often in a hospital, where medical treatment is given to people who do not need to stay in the hospital

sentences.english: We put some ointment and a bandage on his knee.
sentences.chinese: 我们在他的膝盖上涂了些药膏，还缠了一条绷带。

sentences.english: The nurse bandaged up his sprained ankle.
sentences.chinese: 护士用绷带包扎他扭伤的脚踝。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow piece of cloth that you tie around a wound or around a part of the body that has been injured
to tie or cover a part of the body with a bandage

sentences.english: The X-ray showed that her leg was not broken.
sentences.chinese: X光片显示她的腿没有骨折。

detailed_translations.english: a beam of radiation1 that can go through solid objects and is used for photographing the inside of the body
to photograph the inside of someone’s body using X-rays

sentences.english: The physician examines the patient then diagnoses the disease and prescribes medication.
sentences.chinese: 内科医生检查了病人，然后对疾病作出诊断，并开出药方。

sentences.english: What punishment does the law prescribe for this crime?
sentences.chinese: 法律规定这种罪行应受何处罚？

detailed_translations.english: to say what medicine or treatment a sick person should have

sentences.english: The new drug will not require a physician's prescription.
sentences.chinese: 这种新药不需要医生的处方。

sentences.english: If you’re pregnant, you can get free prescriptions.
sentences.chinese: 要是怀孕的话可以获得免费的处方药。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper on which a doctor writes what medicine a sick person should have, so that they can get it from a pharmacist

sentences.english: The woman had a ring on her finger, so I assumed she was married.
sentences.chinese: 那女人手指上戴着戒指，因此我猜想她已经结婚了。

sentences.english: We ate with our fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我们用手抓着吃。

detailed_translations.english: one of the four long thin parts on your hand, not including your thumb

sentences.english: He rubbed his chin thoughtfully.
sentences.chinese: 他若有所思地抚摸着下巴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下巴；聊天；引体向上动作
detailed_translations.english: the front part of your face below your mouth

detailed_translations.chinese: 用下巴夹住；与…聊天；在单杠上作引体向上动作

sentences.english: Someone punched him on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 有人一拳打在他的鼻子上。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a person’s or animal’s face used for smelling or breathing

sentences.english: He lifted his glass to his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 他把玻璃杯举到嘴边。

sentences.english: Liam was fast asleep with his mouth wide open.
sentences.chinese: 利亚姆大张着嘴，睡得很熟。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your face which you put food into, or which you use for speaking

sentences.english: She tucked her hair behind her ears.
sentences.chinese: 她把头发拢到耳朵背后。

detailed_translations.english: one of the organs on either side of your head that you hear with

sentences.english: Mike rubbed the back of his neck.
sentences.chinese: 迈克揉了揉后颈。

sentences.english: You have a lot of tension in your neck muscles.
sentences.chinese: 你的颈部肌肉很紧张。

sentences.english: He patted his horse’s neck.
sentences.chinese: 他拍了拍马脖子。

sentences.english: She had a mass of golden hair, which she wore in a coil at the nape  of her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她有一头金发，盘在脖子后面。

sentences.english: The dog picked up the puppy and carried it by the scruff of the neck into the house.
sentences.chinese: 那条狗叼住小狗的后颈，把它叼进了屋子。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body that joins your head to your shoulders, or the same part of an animal or bird

sentences.english: He punched him on the jaw.
sentences.chinese: 他一拳打在他的下巴上。

sentences.english: a rugged physique and a strong square jaw
sentences.chinese: 强健的体格以及结实的方下巴

sentences.english: She’s got a very determined jaw.
sentences.chinese: 她一脸坚毅。

detailed_translations.english: the lower part of your face. Its shape is sometimes thought to show your character

sentences.english: She had all the normal childhood illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 儿童的常见病她小时候都得过。

sentences.english: Her mother was recovering from a serious illness.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲重病后正在逐渐康复。

sentences.english: I’ve never missed a day’s work through illness.
sentences.chinese: 我从未因病耽误过一天工作。

sentences.english: ways to improve your health and reduce the risk of illness
sentences.chinese: 增进健康减少疾病的方法

detailed_translations.english: a disease of the body or mind, or the condition of being ill

sentences.english: Bridget can’t come – she’s ill.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特不能来了，她生病了。

sentences.english: He was unable to join the army because of ill health.
sentences.chinese: 他因为身体不好没法参军。

sentences.english: The animals had been grossly ill-treated.
sentences.chinese: 那些动物受到了恣意虐待。

detailed_translations.english: suffering from a disease or not feeling well
badly or in an unpleasant way

sentences.english: a polio vaccine
sentences.chinese: 小儿麻痹症疫苗

sentences.english: Doctors worried that there would not be enough vaccine for everyone who needed it.
sentences.chinese: 医生担心没有足够的疫苗给每个需要的人。

detailed_translations.english: a substance which contains a weak form of the bacteria or virus that causes a disease and is used to protect people from that disease

sentences.english: Some of these bacteria are actually good for you.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，这些细菌有的对你是很有好处的。

sentences.english: When you eat off the plate, all of those bacteria go into your stomach.
sentences.chinese: 当你吃掉了盘子里的食物时，这些细菌就会进入你的肚子。

sentences.english: But she correctly points out that bacteria are everywhere: on us, in us and all around us.
sentences.chinese: 但是她正确地指出细菌无处不在：在我们身上，在我们体内以及在我们周围。

detailed_translations.english: very small living things, some of which cause illness or disease

sentences.english: His hands were badly scarred by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他的双手被那次大火烧得疤痕累累。

sentences.english: She will probably be scarred for life .
sentences.chinese: 她有可能留下永久的疤痕。

detailed_translations.english: if a wound or cut scars you, it leaves a permanent mark on your body
a permanent mark that is left on your skin after you have had a cut or wound

sentences.english: The open cities will be testing grounds for our external policies.
sentences.chinese: 使开放城市成为对外政策的窗口。

sentences.english: The ear canal also named middle ear splays out at the external position.
sentences.chinese: 耳道亦称中耳，内小外大呈喇叭状。

sentences.english: Riddled with a thousand gaping wounds, this reactionary clique is now beset with difficulties and contradictions both in internal and external affairs.
sentences.chinese: 今天， 这个反动集团百孔千疮， 内外交困， 矛盾重重。

sentences.english: We have no interest in interfering in the internal affairs of other countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们对干涉其他国家内政不感兴趣。

sentences.english: the threat to internal security
sentences.chinese: 对国内安全的威胁

sentences.english: internal markets
sentences.chinese: 国内市场

sentences.english: There’s to be an internal inquiry into the whole affair.
sentences.chinese: 对整个事件将进行内部调查。

detailed_translations.english: within a particular country

sentences.english: There have been great advances in the treatment of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 癌症治疗有了很大的进展。

sentences.english: Just lately, Kyra has been giving me the silent treatment (= refusing to speak to me because she is angry with me ) .
sentences.chinese: 就在最近，凯拉一直对我不理不睬。

detailed_translations.english: something that is done to cure someone who is injured or ill

sentences.english: She treats me like one of the family.
sentences.chinese: 她把我当作家人看待。

sentences.english: sewage treated so that it can be used as fertilizer
sentences.chinese: 经过处理可用作肥料的污水

sentences.english: Let's go out for lunch─ my treat (= I will pay) .
sentences.chinese: 咱们到外面去吃午餐，我请客。

detailed_translations.english: to behave towards someone or something in a particular way
something special that you give someone or do for them because you know they will enjoy it

sentences.english: I was so hungry my stomach hurt.
sentences.chinese: 我饿得胃都痛了。

sentences.english: His stomach was full of food.
sentences.chinese: 他的胃里塞满了食物。

detailed_translations.english: the organ inside your body where food begins to be  digested
to be able to accept something, especially something unpleasant

sentences.english: Regular exercise is good for the heart.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼对心脏有好处。

sentences.english: Can you hear my heart beating?
sentences.chinese: 你能听见我的心跳吗？

sentences.english: Her cheeks were hot and her heart was pounding.
sentences.chinese: 她脸颊发烫，心怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: My heart raced. Were we going to land safely?
sentences.chinese: 我心跳得厉害。我们能安全着陆吗？

sentences.english: Daniel had no history of heart problems.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔没有心脏病史。

sentences.english: She suffers from a rare heart condition.
sentences.chinese: 她患有罕见的心脏病。

sentences.english: His breathing and heart rate were now normal.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸和心率现在都正常了。

detailed_translations.english: the organ in your chest which pumps blood through your body

sentences.english: Your baby's heartbeat will be monitored continuously.
sentences.chinese: 您小宝宝的心跳将会受到持续监听。

detailed_translations.english: the action or sound of your heart as it pumps blood through your body

sentences.english: Smoking can cause lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟会引起肺癌。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two organs in your body that you breathe with

sentences.english: a recipe book
sentences.chinese: 一本烹饪书

detailed_translations.english: a set of instructions for cooking a particular type of food

sentences.english: new drug therapies
sentences.chinese: 新的药物疗法

sentences.english: radiation therapy for cancer treatment
sentences.chinese: 治疗癌症的放射疗法

detailed_translations.english: the treatment of an illness or injury over a fairly long period of time

sentences.english: For milder depressions, certain forms of psychotherapy do work well.
sentences.chinese: 对于比较轻微的抑郁症，某些形式的心理疗法确实很有效。

detailed_translations.english: the treatment of mental illness, for example  depression  , by talking to someone and discussing their problems rather than giving them drugs

sentences.english: a speech therapist
sentences.chinese: 言语治疗师

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been trained to give a particular form of treatment for physical or mental illness

sentences.english: I’m worried about my husband’s health.
sentences.chinese: 我担心我丈夫的健康状况。

sentences.english: Even if you haven’t got much money, at least you’ve got your health.
sentences.chinese: 即使你没有太多钱，但起码你拥有健康。

detailed_translations.english: the general condition of your body and how healthy you are

sentences.english: a healthy baby boy
sentences.chinese: 健康的男婴

sentences.english: I’ve always been perfectly healthy until now.
sentences.chinese: 直到现在，我的身体一直非常健康。

sentences.english: a healthy lifestyle
sentences.chinese: 健康的生活方式

detailed_translations.english: physically strong and not likely to become ill or weak

sentences.english: unhealthy living conditions
sentences.chinese: 不利于健康的生活环境

detailed_translations.chinese: 不健康的；危险的；有害身心健康的
detailed_translations.english: likely to make you ill

sentences.english: His mother’s very sick.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲病得很重。

sentences.english: Maria can’t come in today because she’s sick.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚因为生病今天不能来了。

sentences.english: a sick child
sentences.chinese: 生病的孩子

sentences.english: a sick animal
sentences.chinese: 患病的动物

sentences.english: What will happen to the business if you fall sick (= become ill ) or die?
sentences.chinese: 假如你生病或是去世了，公司怎么办？

sentences.english: He took sick (= became ill ) and died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 他病倒后一周就去世了。

sentences.english: Pete’s at home in bed, sick as a dog (= very sick ) .
sentences.chinese: 皮特卧床在家，病得很重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 厌恶的；病态的；不舒服；渴望的；恶心的 ；生病的
detailed_translations.english: suffering from a disease or illness
people who are ill

sentences.english: an insurance policy against long-term sickness and injury

Centigrade is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 0 degrees and boils at 100 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °C.

sentences.english: Regular physical activity helps to control your weight.
sentences.chinese: 定期参加体育活动有助于控制体重。

detailed_translations.english: things that people do, especially in order to achieve a particular aim

sentences.english: I do yoga twice a week.
sentences.chinese: 我一周做两次瑜伽。

detailed_translations.chinese: 瑜珈（意为“结合”，指修行）；瑜珈术
detailed_translations.english: a system of exercises that help you control your mind and body in order to relax

sentences.english: Do you want to go bowling with us Friday?
sentences.chinese: 星期五想和我们一起去打保龄球吗？

detailed_translations.english: an indoor game in which you roll a large heavy ball along a wooden track in order to knock down a group of  pin s (=  wooden objects shaped like bottles  )

sentences.english: Can I try you new badminton racket?
sentences.chinese: 我可以试用你的羽毛球拍吗？

sentences.english: I like playing basketball and  badminton.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢的篮球和羽毛球。

sentences.english: My friend and I take part in sports like tennis,badminton and swimming.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的朋友参加体育运动如打网球,羽毛球和游泳.

detailed_translations.english: a game that is similar to tennis but played with a  shuttlecock (=  small feathered object  )  instead of a ball

sentences.english: She excels all of us at tennis.
sentences.chinese: 她的网球比我们打得都好。

sentences.english: I like his smile and his tennis!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢他的微笑和他的网球！

sentences.english: If she decides to go with her sister instead, then I can play tennis with you.
sentences.chinese: 要是她决定和她姐姐一起出去，那我就能和你去打网球。

detailed_translations.english: a game for two people or two pairs of people who use  rackets  to hit a small soft ball backwards and forwards over a net

sentences.english: Try to fit some regular exercise into your daily routine.
sentences.chinese: 尽量在日常生活中安排一些经常性的锻炼。

sentences.english: Working in an office, I don’t get much exercise.
sentences.chinese: 由于在办公室工作，我很少运动。

sentences.english: role-play exercises
sentences.chinese: 角色扮演练习

sentences.english: Horses need to be exercised regularly.
sentences.chinese: 马需要有规律的训练。

detailed_translations.english: physical activities that you do in order to stay healthy and become stronger
to do sports or other physical activities in order to stay healthy or become stronger; to make an animal do this

sentences.english: The average weight of a baby at birth is just over seven pounds.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿的平均出生体重是七磅多一点。

sentences.english: It can be sewn into curtain hems to weight the curtain and so allow it to hang better.
sentences.chinese: 可以把它缝在窗帘的摺边里以增加窗帘的重量，使之更有下垂感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性
detailed_translations.english: how heavy something is when you measure it
If you weight something, you make it heavier by adding something to it, for example, in order to stop it from moving easily

sentences.english: But the traffic worries me! I’m not sure about cycling in such heavy traffic.
sentences.chinese: 但是交通使我担心！ 在这么拥挤的车辆中骑自行车我不太肯定。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of riding a bicycle

sentences.english: martial music
sentences.chinese: 军乐

detailed_translations.english: connected with war and fighting

sentences.english: You should carry your membership card with you at all times.
sentences.chinese: 你应该随身携带会员卡。

sentences.english: Membership fees are being increased this year.
sentences.chinese: 会费今年提高了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 会员身份， 会籍； 全体会员， 会员数
detailed_translations.english: when someone is a member of a club, group, or organization

sentences.english: a management consultant
sentences.chinese: 管理顾问

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to give advice on a particular subject

sentences.english: a driving instructor
sentences.chinese: 驾驶教练

sentences.english: ski instructors
sentences.chinese: 滑雪教练

detailed_translations.english: someone who teaches a sport or practical skill

sentences.english: His headmaster agreed to act as his referee.
sentences.chinese: 他的校长同意做他的推荐人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who makes sure that the rules of a sport such as football,  basketball  , or  boxing  , are followed
to be the referee of a game

sentences.english: You should never judge a person by their looks.
sentences.chinese: 决不要以貌取人。

sentences.english: Judge us on the improvements we make in the economy.
sentences.chinese: 请根据我们在经济方面取得的进步来评价我们。

sentences.english: The therapist judged that Margaret had made a serious attempt to kill herself.
sentences.chinese: 治疗专家断定玛格丽特曾真的企图自杀。

sentences.english: pollutants that were judged hazardous to human health
sentences.chinese: 被认为对人体健康有害的污染物

sentences.english: I am in no position to judge whether what she is doing is right or wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我无权评判她在做的事是对是错。

sentences.english: The economic results of the reforms are very difficult to judge.
sentences.chinese: 这些改革所带来的经济成效很难评价。

sentences.english: The likelihood of future bombs was impossible to judge.
sentences.chinese: 未来发生爆炸案的可能性无法预测。

sentences.english: We judge the success of a product by the number of sales it brings in.
sentences.chinese: 我们以销量来评价一种产品成功与否。

sentences.english: His conduct, judged objectively by what he has done, is dishonest.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为，从他所做的这一切客观地来评价，是不诚实的。

sentences.english: Robert wanted to go and help him, but judged it best to stay where he was.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特想过去帮他，但考虑之后还是觉得待在原地为妙。

sentences.english: Do not judge her too harshly, as she was very young at the time.
sentences.chinese: 对她的评价不要太苛刻，毕竟那时候她还很年轻。

detailed_translations.english: to form or give an opinion about someone or something after thinking carefully about all the information you know about them
the official in control of a court, who decides how criminals should be punished

sentences.english: He umpired baseball games.
sentences.chinese: 他过去担任棒球比赛的裁判。

detailed_translations.english: to be the umpire in a game or competition
the person who makes sure that the players obey the rules in sports such as tennis, baseball, and cricket

sentences.english: I go to the gym as often as I can.
sentences.chinese: 我一有空就去健身房健身。

detailed_translations.english: a special building or room that has equipment for doing physical exercise

sentences.english: a gymnastics display
sentences.chinese: 体操表演

sentences.english: We don’t do gymnastics at school.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校没有体操训练。

detailed_translations.english: a sport involving physical exercises and movements that need skill, strength, and control, and that are often performed in competitions

sentences.english: He’s a very keen sportsman .
sentences.chinese: 他是个非常喜爱运动的人。

sentences.english: a talented all-round sportsman
sentences.chinese: 一名有天赋的全能运动员

detailed_translations.english: a man who plays several different sports

sentences.english: the dancer’s graceful movements
sentences.chinese: 舞蹈演员优美的动作

sentences.english: reports of troop movements in the area
sentences.chinese: 该地区部队动向的报告

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something changes position or moves from one place to another

sentences.english: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.english: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.english: It took muscle to work in an old-fashioned kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 在老式厨房里干活很费力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

sentences.english: The courts were asked to adopt a more flexible approach to young offenders.
sentences.chinese: 法庭被要求对少年犯采取更为灵活的处理方法。

sentences.english: The store recently adopted a drug testing policy for all new employees.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店近来实行新雇员一律要做药检的政策。

sentences.english: California has adopted a tough stance on the issue.
sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚州对这一问题持强硬立场。

detailed_translations.english: to start to deal with or think about something in a particular way

sentences.english: artificial flowers
sentences.chinese: 假花

sentences.english: artificial light
sentences.chinese: 人造光

sentences.english: artificial fertilizers
sentences.chinese: 化肥

detailed_translations.english: not real or not made of natural things but made to be like something that is real or natural

sentences.english: We followed the footprints of a deer in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我们追踪雪地里一头鹿的足迹。

detailed_translations.english: a mark made by a foot or shoe

sentences.english: Younger workers tend to be at an advantage (=  have an advantage  ) when applying for jobs.
sentences.chinese: 年轻点的工人申请工作时往往处于优势地位。

sentences.english: One of the many advantages of living in New York is that you can eat out at almost any time of day.
sentences.chinese: 住在纽约的诸多好处之一是几乎任何时候都可以外出吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: something that helps you to be more successful than others, or the state of having this

sentences.english: ...the vivid kaleidoscope of colours displayed in the plumage of the peacock.
sentences.chinese: ...孔雀羽毛的五彩缤纷。

detailed_translations.english: a pattern, situation, or scene that is always changing and has many details or bright colours

sentences.english: Can I ask you a question?
sentences.chinese: 我能问你个问题吗？

sentences.english: I’m afraid I can’t answer that question.
sentences.chinese: 我恐怕无法回答那个问题。

detailed_translations.english: a sentence, phrase or word that asks for information

sentences.english: Write an essay of about five hundred words.
sentences.chinese: 写一篇约500字的文章。

sentences.english: What does that word mean?
sentences.chinese: 那个单词是什么意思？

sentences.english: ‘Vater’ is the German word for (= that means ) ‘father’.
sentences.chinese: vater在德语中是“父亲”的意思。

sentences.english: Perhaps ‘lucky’ is not exactly the right word .
sentences.chinese: 也许“幸运”一词还不够贴切。

detailed_translations.chinese: [语] 单词；话语；消息；诺言；命令
detailed_translations.english: a single group of letters that are used together with a particular meaning
to use words that are carefully chosen in order to express something

sentences.english: Divide it into thirds.
sentences.chinese: 把它分成三等份。

detailed_translations.english: one of three equal parts of something
coming after two other things in a series

sentences.english: Alex’s real problem is that he lacks confidence.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯的真正问题是缺乏信心。

detailed_translations.english: to not have something that you need, or not have enough of it

sentences.english: It will be returned within three working days (= three days, not including weekends or public holidays ) .
sentences.chinese: 将于三个工作日之内退还。

detailed_translations.english: a day of the week when most people work. In Britain and the US this is usually Monday to Friday
the way something such as a system, piece of equipment, or organization works

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作；影响；受雇用（work的ing形式）

sentences.english: She has reason to feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她有理由感到内疚。

sentences.english: the human power of reason
sentences.chinese: 人类的理性

sentences.english: They reasoned that other businesses would soon copy the idea.
sentences.chinese: 他们推断其他企业也会很快仿效这个点子。

detailed_translations.english: why something happens, or why someone does something
to form a particular judgment about a situation after carefully considering the facts

sentences.english: Reading and writing are two different skills.
sentences.chinese: 阅读和写作是两种不同的技能。

sentences.english: Many jobs today require computer skills.
sentences.chinese: 如今的许多工作都需要计算机技能。

detailed_translations.english: an ability to do something well, especially because you have learned and practised it

sentences.english: She was older than me, but that wasn’t really a problem.
sentences.chinese: 她比我年长，不过那不算什么问题。

sentences.english: She gave us 20 mathematical problems to solve.
sentences.chinese: 她让我们解20道数学题。

detailed_translations.english: a situation that causes difficulties

sentences.english: I’ve already seen a few movies of this type.
sentences.chinese: 我已经看过几部这种类型的影片了。

sentences.english: He types with two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 他用两个手指打字。

detailed_translations.english: one member of a group of people or things that have similar features or qualities
to write something using a computer or a typewriter

sentences.english: typical British weather
sentences.chinese: 典型的英国天气

sentences.english: This advertisement is a typical example of their marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 这则广告是他们营销策略的一个典型例子。

detailed_translations.english: having the usual features or qualities of a particular group or thing

sentences.english: The book sold more than a million copies.
sentences.chinese: 这本书售出了一百多万册。

sentences.english: I’ve got a million ideas.
sentences.chinese: 我主意多得很。

detailed_translations.english: the number 1,000,000
an extremely large number of people or things

sentences.english: Our table tennis team captured three gold medals at the games.
sentences.chinese: 我们的乒乓球队在比赛中赢得了三块金牌。

sentences.english: In table tennis, the eyes see the ball coming, judge its speed and direction, and pass this information on to the brain.
sentences.chinese: 比如说，打乒乓球的时候，眼睛看到球打过来，判断其速度和方向，马上将这个信息传给大脑。

detailed_translations.english: an indoor game played on a table by two or four players who hit a small plastic ball to each other across a net

sentences.english: But even in this "concertinaed" timeline - extending millions of centuries into the future, as well as into the past - this century is special.
sentences.chinese: 不过，即使在这张向未来、向过去延伸数百万世纪的“折叠式”时间表上，本世纪也是特别的一个世纪。

sentences.english: Have you seen any good films recently?
sentences.chinese: 你最近看过什么好的影片吗？

sentences.english: I shot five rolls of film on vacation.
sentences.chinese: 我在度假时拍了五卷胶卷。

sentences.english: a film of oil on the surface of the water
sentences.chinese: 水面上的一层油

detailed_translations.english: a story that is told using sound and moving pictures, shown at a cinema or on television

sentences.english: Back then, you got a feature film, a cartoon, a serial, and a newsreel.
sentences.chinese: 那时的电影有故事片、卡通片、系列影片和新闻纪录片。

sentences.english: Included in the show are photographs, clips of newsreel and documentary footage, African-American newspapers and periodicals, and "portable" culture such as fans, buttons, posters and pamphlets.
sentences.chinese: 展览展出了图片、新闻短片的剪报、纪录片的脚本、非洲裔美国人的报纸和期刊，还有一些“便携式”的视觉文化产物，如扇子、小徽章、海报和宣传册。

detailed_translations.english: a short film of news that was shown in cinemas in the past

sentences.english: One of the most useful sources of documentary evidence is maps.
sentences.chinese: 最有价值的文献证据之一就是地图。

sentences.english: ...a TV documentary on homelessness.
sentences.chinese: …一部关于无家可归现象的电视记录片。

detailed_translations.english: consisting of or written on documents
a film or television or a radio programme that gives detailed information about a particular subject

sentences.english: ...a misleadingly violent trailer for the film.
sentences.chinese: …一个让人误以为充斥暴力的电影预告片。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拖车；[电视] 预告片；追踪者
detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that can be pulled behind another vehicle, used for carrying something heavy

detailed_translations.chinese: 乘拖车式活动房屋旅行

sentences.english: a career in stand-up comedy
sentences.chinese: 单口喜剧表演职业

detailed_translations.english: entertainment that is intended to make people laugh

sentences.english: The tragedy happened as they were returning home from a night out.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧发生在他们夜里外出归来的路上。

sentences.english: Tragedy struck the family when their two-year-old son was killed in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧降临到这个家庭，他们两岁的儿子在一次事故中丧生。

detailed_translations.english: a very sad event, that shocks people because it involves death

sentences.english: One hundred and twenty people died in China’s worst air disaster .
sentences.chinese: 有120人在中国这起最惨烈的空难事故中丧生。

sentences.english: the economic consequences of the Chernobyl nuclear disaster
sentences.chinese: 切尔诺贝利核灾难给经济带来的后果

sentences.english: The 1987 hurricane was the worst natural disaster to hit England for decades.
sentences.chinese: 1987年的飓风是英格兰数十年来遭遇的最为严重的自然灾害。

sentences.english: Their expedition nearly ended in disaster , when one of the climbers slid off the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 一名登山者从山上滑落，他们的探险活动险些以灾难告终。

sentences.english: The drought could spell disaster for wildlife.
sentences.chinese: 干旱可能会对野生生物造成灾难。

sentences.english: Disaster struckwhen two men were killed during their parachute jumps.
sentences.chinese: 灾难突然降临，两名男子在跳伞过程中丧生。

sentences.english: The peace process was on the brink of disaster .
sentences.chinese: 和平进程到了灾难的边缘。

sentences.english: Luckily the pilot saw the other plane just in time, and a disaster was narrowly averted .
sentences.chinese: 幸好驾驶员及时看到了另一架飞机，侥幸避免了一场灾难。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden event such as a flood, storm, or accident which causes great damage or suffering

sentences.english: ...a tense psychological thriller.
sentences.chinese: …一部紧张刺激的心理惊悚小说。

detailed_translations.chinese: 惊险小说；使人毛骨悚然的东西；使人毛骨悚然的小说
detailed_translations.english: a book or film that tells an exciting story about murder or crime

sentences.english: ...recent biographies of Stalin.
sentences.chinese: …近年的斯大林传记。

detailed_translations.english: a book that tells what has happened in someone’s life, written by someone else

sentences.english: the western end of the bay
sentences.chinese: 海湾的西端

sentences.english: Western Australia
sentences.chinese: 西澳大利亚

detailed_translations.chinese: 西方的，西部的；有西方特征的
detailed_translations.english: in or from the west of a country or area

detailed_translations.chinese: 西方人；西部片，西部小说
detailed_translations.english: a film about life in the 19th century in the American West, especially the lives of cowboys

sentences.english: a Walt Disney cartoon
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼动画片

sentences.english: ...one of Britain's best-loved cartoon characters, Rupert the Bear.
sentences.chinese: 英国最受欢迎的漫画形象之一——鲁珀特熊

detailed_translations.english: a short film that is made by photographing a series of drawings

sentences.english: a goods train
sentences.chinese: 一列货车

sentences.english: the large market for consumer goods
sentences.chinese: 庞大的消费品市场

sentences.english: Britain’s leading exporter of manufactured goods
sentences.chinese: 英国主要的工业制成品出口商

sentences.english: There will be tax increases on a range of goods and services .
sentences.chinese: 有一些商品和服务将要增税。

detailed_translations.english: things which are carried by road, train etc

sentences.english: a famous actor
sentences.chinese: 著名演员

sentences.english: Many famous people have stayed in the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 许多名人都曾下榻这家酒店。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark (= a famous place or building that is easy to recognize ) .
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔是著名的地标。

sentences.english: Da Vinci’s world-famous portrait of the Mona Lisa
sentences.chinese: 达•芬奇的那幅闻名世界的肖像画《蒙娜丽莎》

detailed_translations.english: known about by many people in many places

sentences.english: the famed literary critic Nathan Hall
sentences.chinese: 著名的文学评论家内森•霍尔

detailed_translations.english: well-known

sentences.english: The rise in crime is mainly due to social and economic factors.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率上升主要由社会和经济因素造成。

detailed_translations.chinese: 因素， 因子； 系数
detailed_translations.english: one of several things that influence or cause a situation

sentences.english: Tuberculosis is still common in some parts of the world .
sentences.chinese: 结核病在世界上某些地区仍很常见。

sentences.english: At that time China was the most powerful country in the world .
sentences.chinese: 当时中国是世界上最强大的国家。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal attracts visitors from around the world .
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Students from all over the world come to study at Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的学生到牛津大学来求学。

sentences.english: Children are the same the world over .
sentences.chinese: 全世界的孩子都一样。

sentences.english: The book has been published throughout the world .
sentences.chinese: 这本书已在世界各地出版。

sentences.english: There is nothing quite like it anywhere in the world .
sentences.chinese: 世界上任何地方都找不出和它类似的东西。

sentences.english: Europe’s relationship with the rest of the world
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和世界上其他地区的关系

sentences.english: I decided to take a year off to travel the world .
sentences.chinese: 我决定休息一年去周游世界。

sentences.english: a crime that shocked the world
sentences.chinese: 震惊全世界的罪行

detailed_translations.chinese: 世界；领域；世俗；全人类；物质生活
detailed_translations.english: the  planet  we live on, and all the people, cities, and countries on it

sentences.english: I was in the back seat and Jo was driving.
sentences.chinese: 我在后座，乔开车。

sentences.english: a 10,000-seat stadium
sentences.chinese: 万人体育场

sentences.english: People were shifting in their seats, looking uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 人们在座位上动来动去，看上去不大自在。

sentences.english: He waved toward a chair, and seated himself at the desk.
sentences.chinese: 他朝一把椅子一挥手，在桌旁坐了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can sit, especially one in a vehicle or one from which you watch a performance, sports event etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职
detailed_translations.english: If you seat yourself somewhere, you sit down

sentences.english: the story of life on a small farm at the turn of the century
sentences.chinese: 讲述世纪初一个小农场生活的故事

detailed_translations.english: one of the 100-year periods measured from before or after the year of Christ’s birth

sentences.english: You should talk to Ken – he's always full of good ideas.
sentences.chinese: 你应该和肯谈谈，他总是满脑子好主意。

sentences.english: I knew it was a bad idea to leave him on his own.
sentences.chinese: 我知道把他独自留下不是个好主意。

sentences.english: It was my wife’s idea to move house.
sentences.chinese: 要搬家是我妻子的主意。

sentences.english: He has some very strange ideas about education.
sentences.chinese: 他对教育有些非常奇怪的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or suggestion for a possible course of action, especially one that you think of suddenly

sentences.english: The advice in the booklet reflects the practical experience we have gained (= experience gained by actually doing something, rather than knowledge from books etc ).
sentences.chinese: 小册子中的建议反映了我们所获得的实践经验。

sentences.english: I had some experience in fashion design.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些时装设计方面的经验。

sentences.english: She was turned down on the grounds of lack of experience.
sentences.chinese: 她因缺乏经验而被拒绝。

sentences.english: The book is based on personal experience .
sentences.chinese: 本书是根据个人经历写成的。

detailed_translations.english: knowledge or skill that you gain from doing a job or activity, or the process of doing this

sentences.english: an experienced pilot
sentences.chinese: 经验丰富的飞行员

sentences.english: an experienced public speaker
sentences.chinese: 老练的公开演讲者

sentences.english: She is experienced and self-assured.
sentences.chinese: 她经验丰富且充满自信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 老练的，熟练的；富有经验的
detailed_translations.english: possessing skills or knowledge because you have done something often or for a long time

sentences.english: How would you cope with unemployment and the resulting loss of income?
sentences.chinese: 你会如何应付失业及由此造成的收入损失？

detailed_translations.english: if something results from something else, it is caused by it
something that happens or exists because of something that happened before

sentences.english: The Government are planning further cuts in public spending.
sentences.chinese: 政府正计划进一步削减公共支出。

sentences.english: The US government has tightened restrictions on firearms.
sentences.chinese: 美国政府已经加强了对枪支的管制。

sentences.english: Neither party had the majority necessary to form a government.
sentences.chinese: 两个政党都没有获得组阁所必需的多数票。

sentences.english: strong government
sentences.chinese: 强有力的统治

detailed_translations.english: the group of people who govern a country or state

sentences.english: I got caught speeding on the A40 yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我在 A40 号干线公路上超速行驶被逮到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞驰，迅速前进，急行；加速；超速行驶
detailed_translations.english: to be driving faster than the legal limit
the rate at which something moves or travels

detailed_translations.chinese: 快速传送； 促进， 使加速
detailed_translations.english: to take someone or something somewhere very quickly

sentences.english: Can I offer you something to drink?
sentences.chinese: 我给你拿点喝的好吗？

sentences.english: I can’t turn down the offer of a free trip to Milan!
sentences.chinese: 我怎能拒绝免费去米兰旅行的机会！

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone if they would like to have something, or to hold something out to them so that they can take it
a statement saying that you are willing to do something for someone or give them something

sentences.english: Your work has improved in quantity and quality this term.
sentences.chinese: 这学期你的作业在完成数量和质量上都有提高。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that can be counted or measured

sentences.english: The warehouse was completely destroyed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 仓库全给烧毁了。

sentences.english: Thirty people died in a fire in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 30人死于芝加哥市中心的一场火灾。

sentences.english: Police think that the fire was started deliberately.
sentences.chinese: 警方认为有人故意纵火。

sentences.english: Rioters set fire to a whole row of stores (= made them start burning ) .
sentences.chinese: 暴徒纵火焚烧了一整排商店。

sentences.english: Soldiers fired on the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 士兵朝人群开枪。

detailed_translations.english: uncontrolled flames, light, and heat that destroy and damage things
to shoot bullets or bombs

sentences.english: a low wooden table with a glass top
sentences.chinese: 玻璃桌面的矮木桌

detailed_translations.chinese: 顶部，顶端；上部；首席；陀螺
detailed_translations.english: the highest part of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 高出，超越；结束；达到顶点
detailed_translations.english: to be higher than a particular amount
nearest to the top of something

sentences.english: Where do those kids get their energy from?
sentences.chinese: 那些孩子哪来这么多精力？

sentences.english: I really put a lot of energy into what I do.
sentences.chinese: 我做起事来总是投入很大精力。

sentences.english: kinetic energy
sentences.chinese: 动能

detailed_translations.english: the physical and mental strength that makes you able to do things

sentences.english: I was angry because he hadn’t told me his plans.
sentences.chinese: 我很生气，因为他没有告诉我他的计划。

sentences.english: He was beginning to get angry .
sentences.chinese: 他开始发脾气了。

sentences.english: His comments brought an angry response from opposition politicians.
sentences.chinese: 他的话激起反对派政客愤怒的回应。

sentences.english: ‘Calm down,’ she said, looking at his angry face.
sentences.chinese: “冷静一下。”她看着他那张生气的脸说道。

sentences.english: Jesse laughed, which made me even angrier .
sentences.chinese: 杰西笑了起来，这令我更加恼火。

detailed_translations.english: feeling strong emotions which make you want to shout at someone or hurt them because they have behaved in an unfair, cruel, offensive etc way, or because you think that a situation is unfair, unacceptable etc

sentences.english: It’s our job to establish the cause of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 查明起火原因是我们的责任。

sentences.english: There is no cause for alarm.
sentences.chinese: 不必惊慌。

sentences.english: My father fought for the Nationalist cause.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲为民族党的事业而奋斗。

detailed_translations.english: a person, event, or thing that makes something happen

sentences.english: I heard the clock strike six (= make six loud sounds ) .
sentences.chinese: 我听到钟敲了六下。

sentences.english: The station clock was ten minutes slow (= showed a time ten minutes earlier than the real time ) .
sentences.chinese: 车站的钟慢了十分钟。

detailed_translations.english: an instrument that shows what time it is, in a room or outside on a building

sentences.english: Recent stock market losses point to trouble ahead.
sentences.chinese: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: problems or difficulties
to say something or ask someone to do something which may use or waste their time or upset them

sentences.english: The economy has become a troublesome issue for the Conservative Party.
sentences.chinese: 经济状况已成为保守党的一大难题。

detailed_translations.english: A troublesome situation or issue is full of complicated problems or difficulties.

sentences.english: The purpose of this meeting is to elect a new chairman.
sentences.chinese: 这次会议的目的是选出一位新主席。

detailed_translations.english: the purpose of something is what it is intended to achieve

sentences.english: Denver aimed his gun but did not shoot.
sentences.chinese: 丹佛举枪瞄准，但是没有射击。

sentences.english: My criticism wasn't aimed at you.
sentences.chinese: 我的批评不是针对你的。

sentences.english: They are aiming to reduce unemployment by 50%.
sentences.chinese: 他们正力求使失业人数下降50%。

detailed_translations.english: to point or direct a weapon, a shot, a kick, etc. at sb/sth

sentences.english: diplomatic/international/foreign relations
sentences.chinese: 外交 / 国际 / 对外关系

sentences.english: a close/near/distant relation of mine
sentences.chinese: 我的一位近亲 / 远亲

detailed_translations.english: the way in which two people, groups or countries behave towards each other or deal with each other

sentences.english: I have quite a good relationship with my parents.
sentences.chinese: 我和父母关系很好。

sentences.english: the relationship between diet and health problems
sentences.chinese: 膳食与健康问题之间的联系

detailed_translations.english: the way in which two people or two groups feel about each other and behave towards each other

sentences.english: a collection of valuable paintings
sentences.chinese: 一批珍贵的画作

sentences.english: Can you help me hang this painting (= put it on a wall ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我把这幅画挂起来好吗？

sentences.english: painting and decorating
sentences.chinese: 油漆和装潢

detailed_translations.english: a picture that has been painted

sentences.english: The ceiling needs painting.
sentences.chinese: 天花板需要粉刷了。

sentences.english: brightly paintedhouses
sentences.chinese: 粉刷得很亮丽的房屋

sentences.english: The living room was painted in pastel shades of pink and blue.
sentences.chinese: 起居室被漆成淡雅的粉色和蓝色。

detailed_translations.english: to put paint on a surface
to make a picture, design etc using paint

sentences.english: Steve gripped the steering wheel tightly with both hands.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫双手紧握方向盘。

sentences.english: In her hand was a tattered old photograph.
sentences.chinese: 她手中拿着的是一张破旧的老照片。

sentences.english: the hour hand
sentences.chinese: 时针

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body at the end of your arm, including your fingers and thumb, that you use to hold things

sentences.english: a temperature range of 72-85˚
sentences.chinese: 72 度到85度之间的温度范围

sentences.english: Even the cheapest property was out of our price range (= too expensive for us ) .
sentences.chinese: 即使是最便宜的房子也超出了我们能承受的价格范围。

sentences.english: There were 120 students whose ages ranged from 10 to 18.
sentences.chinese: 有120名学生，年龄在10至18岁之间。

detailed_translations.english: the limits within which amounts, quantities, ages etc vary
if prices, levels, temperatures etc range from one amount to another, they include both those amounts and anything in between

sentences.english: The cheaper drugs are just as effective in treating arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 较便宜的药品对治疗关节炎同样有效。

sentences.english: the painting’s highly effective use of colour
sentences.chinese: 绘画中得心应手的色彩运用

sentences.english: Training is often much less effective than expected.
sentences.chinese: 训练的效果往往远低于预期。

sentences.english: the most effective ways of reducing inner city congestion
sentences.chinese: 减少旧城区交通拥挤最有效的办法

detailed_translations.english: successful, and working in the way that was intended

sentences.english: a very efficient secretary
sentences.chinese: 效率高的秘书

sentences.english: an efficient use of land
sentences.chinese: 土地的有效使用

sentences.english: Lighting is now more energy efficient.
sentences.chinese: 如今的照明设备更加节能。

detailed_translations.english: if someone or something is efficient, they work well without wasting time, money, or energy

sentences.english: Supporters staged a demonstration outside the US embassy.
sentences.chinese: 支持者在美国大使馆外举行了示威游行。

sentences.english: Police opened fire on a peaceful demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 警察朝和平示威的人群开了枪。

detailed_translations.english: an event at which a large group of people meet to protest or to support something in public

sentences.english: He's the best teacher, even though he has the least experience.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然经验最少，却是最出色的老师。

sentences.english: He’s my least favourite member of staff.
sentences.chinese: 他是最不讨我喜欢的员工。

detailed_translations.english: smallest in size, amount, degree, etc.
less than anything or anyone else

sentences.english: Children have to learn to communicate effectively.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子应该学会有效地沟通。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that produces the result that was intended

sentences.english: This oil lubricates efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 这油能有效地起润滑作用。

sentences.english: That means I have to work more efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 那就意味着我要工作的更有效率。

sentences.english: Others like to use them because they prefer to communicate efficiently and not miss out on any important conversations and connections.
sentences.chinese: 另一些人喜欢他们则是因为他们偏好于更有效的通信，不会错过一些重要的交谈和联系。

sentences.english: Each individual leaf on the tree is different.
sentences.chinese: 树上每片叶子都不相同。

sentences.english: the needs of the individual customer
sentences.chinese: 每位顾客的需求

detailed_translations.english: considered separately from other people or things in the same group
a person, considered separately from the rest of the group or society that they live in

sentences.english: There’s a big difference between knowing that something is true, and being able to prove it.
sentences.chinese: 知道什么正确与能够证明它正确，这之间有很大的不同。

sentences.english: There's not much difference in price between the two computers.
sentences.chinese: 这两种计算机价格上没有多大的差别。

sentences.english: We have our differences , but she's still my sister.
sentences.chinese: 我们之间虽然不和，但她仍旧是我的妹妹。

detailed_translations.english: a way in which two or more people or things are not like each other

sentences.english: The place looks completely different now.
sentences.chinese: 这地方现在完全变了。

sentences.english: They decided to try a radically different approach.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定尝试一种全然不同的办法。

sentences.english: We found women had significantly different political views from men.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现女性的政治观点与男性大不相同。

sentences.english: a slightly different way of doing things
sentences.chinese: 稍有区别的做事方法

sentences.english: What actually happened was subtly different from the PR people’s version.
sentences.chinese: 实际情况与公关部那些人的说法有细微的差别。

sentences.english: The show is refreshingly different from most exhibitions of modern art.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览与大多数现代艺术展不一样，令人耳目一新。

sentences.english: The publishing business is no different from any other business in this respect.
sentences.chinese: 从这一点来讲，出版业和其他任何行业没有什么差别。

sentences.english: It’s a different world here in London.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦这儿的情况完全不同。

detailed_translations.english: not like something or someone else, or not like before

sentences.english: The refugees’ main requirements are food and shelter.
sentences.chinese: 难民的主要需求是食物和住所。

sentences.english: to meet/fulfil/satisfy the requirements
sentences.chinese: 符合 / 满足必备的条件

detailed_translations.english: something that someone needs or asks for

sentences.english: a glass bowl
sentences.chinese: 玻璃碗

sentences.english: a piece of broken glass
sentences.chinese: 一块碎玻璃片

sentences.english: the cathedral’s stained glass windows
sentences.chinese: 教堂的彩色玻璃窗

sentences.english: Nigel raised his glass in a toast to his son.
sentences.chinese: 奈杰尔举杯向儿子祝酒。

detailed_translations.english: a transparent solid substance used for making windows, bottles etc

sentences.english: I really like the variety the store has to offer.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢这家商店商品的丰富多样。

sentences.english: The lake has more than 20 varieties of fish.
sentences.chinese: 那个湖里有二十多种鱼。

sentences.english: a rare variety of orchid
sentences.chinese: 兰花的稀有品种

detailed_translations.english: the differences within a group, set of actions etc that make it interesting

sentences.english: the long-term effects of the drug
sentences.chinese: 这种毒品的长期影响

sentences.english: I could feel the effects of the thin mountain air.
sentences.chinese: 我能感觉到山上稀薄空气产生的影响。

sentences.english: This ingredient also has the effect of making your skin look younger.
sentences.chinese: 这种成分还有使皮肤看上去更年轻的效果。

sentences.english: A system failure has a knock-on effect throughout the whole hotel.
sentences.chinese: 系统故障会给整个酒店带来连锁反应。

sentences.english: the cumulative effect of human activities on the global environment
sentences.chinese: 人类活动对全球环境日积月累的影响

sentences.english: A much lower dose of the painkiller can still produce the desired effect.
sentences.chinese: 大量减少该止痛药的服用剂量依然能产生预期的效果。

sentences.english: In mental illness, there is a complex relationship between cause and effect.
sentences.chinese: 精神疾病有复杂的因果关系。

detailed_translations.english: a change that is caused by an event, action etc

sentences.english: the areas affected by the hurricane
sentences.chinese: 受飓风影响的地区

sentences.english: a disease that affects the central nervous system
sentences.chinese: 影响中枢神经系统的疾病

sentences.english: decisions which affect our lives
sentences.chinese: 影响我们生活的决定

sentences.english: Trading has been adversely affected by the downturn in consumer spending.
sentences.chinese: 贸易受到消费支出回落的不利影响。

sentences.english: We were all deeply affected by her death.
sentences.chinese: 我们都为她的去世深感悲痛。

detailed_translations.english: to do something that produces an effect or change in something or in someone’s situation

sentences.english: If someone invited me over to Florida, I’d jump at the chance (= use the opportunity eagerly ) .
sentences.chinese: 如果有人邀请我去佛罗里达，我会赶紧抓住这个机会。

sentences.english: There’s always the chance that something will go wrong.
sentences.chinese: 总有可能会出现问题。

sentences.english: If we did move to London, I’d stand a much better chance (= have a much better chance ) of getting a job.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们真的搬到伦敦去，我找到工作的机会就大多了。

sentences.english: There is little chance of her being found alive.
sentences.chinese: 她生还的可能性很小。

detailed_translations.english: a time or situation which you can use to do something that you want to do

sentences.english: There have been hints that he may take up coaching.
sentences.chinese: 他暗示过可能会出任教练。

sentences.english: ‘Look, I can’t tell you.’ ‘Oh, come on, give me a hint .’
sentences.chinese: “听着，我不能告诉你。”“得了，给我一点暗示吧。”

sentences.english: I made it clear I wasn’t interested in him, but he didn’t take the hint .
sentences.chinese: 我清楚地表明我对他不感兴趣，但他不明白我的意思。

detailed_translations.english: something that you say or do to suggest something to someone, without telling them directly
to suggest something in an indirect way, but so that someone can guess your meaning

sentences.english: an attentive audience
sentences.chinese: 聚精会神的听众

detailed_translations.english: listening to or watching someone carefully because you are interested

sentences.english: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.chinese: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.english: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.chinese: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.english: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.chinese: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.english: Scott sat down at his desk and turned his attention to the file he had in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.english: As a society we need to give more attention to the needs of older people.
sentences.chinese: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.english: Now he’s gone, I can give you my undivided attention .
sentences.chinese: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.english: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.english: They listened to the speech with close attention .
sentences.chinese: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.english: Attention to detail is essential in this job.
sentences.chinese: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.english: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.chinese: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

detailed_translations.english: when you carefully listen to, look at, or think about someone or something

sentences.english: Health officials have tried to raise awareness (=  improve people’s knowledge  ) about AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 卫生部官员努力提高人们对艾滋病的认识。

detailed_translations.english: knowledge or understanding of a particular subject or situation

sentences.english: I don't think people are really aware of just how much it costs.
sentences.chinese: 我认为人们并不真正明白这要花多少钱。

sentences.english: Were you aware that something was wrong?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有意识到已经出了问题？

detailed_translations.english: knowing or realizing sth

sentences.english: You’re not having much luck today, are you?
sentences.chinese: 你今天运气不太好，是不是？

sentences.english: He’s had good luck with his roses this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年他种玫瑰的运气不错。

sentences.english: It was an incredible piece of luck.
sentences.chinese: 真是令人难以置信的好运气。

sentences.english: Roulette is a game of luck.
sentences.chinese: 轮盘赌是个靠运气的游戏。

detailed_translations.english: good things that happen to you by chance

sentences.english: I had the good fortune to work with a brilliant head of department.
sentences.chinese: 我有幸与一位出色的部门主管共事。

sentences.english: Sickness or ill fortune could reduce you to a needy situation.
sentences.chinese: 疾病或厄运会让你穷困潦倒。

sentences.english: I felt it was useless to struggle against fortune.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得跟命运抗争是徒劳的。

detailed_translations.english: chance or luck, and the effect that it has on your life

sentences.english: The best solution would be for them to separate.
sentences.chinese: 最好的解决方法是他们分开。

sentences.english: he solution of glucose in water
sentences.chinese: 葡萄糖在水中的溶解

detailed_translations.english: a way of solving a problem or dealing with a difficult situation

sentences.english: Charlie thinks money will solve all his problems.
sentences.chinese: 查理认为钱能解决他所有的问题。

sentences.english: the best way of solving our dilemma
sentences.chinese: 解决我们两难处境的最佳办法

sentences.english: attempts to solve a mathematical equation
sentences.chinese: 解数学方程式的尝试

detailed_translations.english: to find or provide a way of dealing with a problem

sentences.english: The jacket is available in various colours.
sentences.chinese: 这种夹克有好多种颜色可选。

sentences.english: There are various ways to answer your question.
sentences.chinese: 有多种方法可以回答你的问题。

sentences.english: He decided to leave school for various reasons.
sentences.chinese: 出于种种原因，他决定辍学。

detailed_translations.chinese: 各种各样的， 不同的
detailed_translations.english: if there are various things, there are several different types of that thing

sentences.english: Could you get me a coffee from the drinks machine ?
sentences.chinese: 给我从自动饮料机里买一罐咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: The fax machine is broken.
sentences.chinese: 传真机坏了。

sentences.english: Did you put my dirty shirts in the machine (= washing machine ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你把我的脏衬衫放进洗衣机里了吗？

sentences.english: I left a message for you on your machine (= telephone answering machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 我在你的电话答录机里留了言。

sentences.english: The machine wouldn’t let me have any money (= cash machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 自动取款机不让我取钱。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job

sentences.english: Profits increased by £1.5m, despite the difficult economic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 尽管经济形势不佳，利润还是增长了150万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the state that something is in, especially how good or bad its physical state is

sentences.english: an unusual feature
sentences.chinese: 不寻常的特点

sentences.english: unusual circumstances
sentences.chinese: 异常状况

sentences.english: It’s unusual for Dave to be late.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫迟到是很少见的。

sentences.english: (= it is quite common ) to feel very angry in a situation like this.
sentences.chinese: 遇到这样的情况觉得非常生气是很正常的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不平常的， 少有的； 独特的， 与众不同的
detailed_translations.english: different from what is usual or normal

sentences.english: Make a cheese sauce in the usual way.
sentences.chinese: 按通常的做法做奶酪酱。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you at the usual time.
sentences.chinese: 我在老时间和你碰头。

sentences.english: She ate twice as much as usual.
sentences.chinese: 她吃了平时食量两倍的东西。

detailed_translations.english: happening, done, or existing most of the time or in most situations

sentences.english: He was always criticising his wife’s appearance.
sentences.chinese: 他老是批评妻子的外表。

sentences.english: We are often attracted to somebody first by their physical appearance .
sentences.chinese: 我们经常先被一个人的外貌吸引。

sentences.english: Women, in general, tend to be more concerned than men about their personal appearance .
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，女性比男性更注重自己的仪容。

sentences.english: She had an outward appearance of calm, but deep down she was really worried.
sentences.chinese: 她表面上很镇静，内心却十分担忧。

sentences.english: The metal posts spoiled the appearance of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 金属柱子破坏了花园的外观。

sentences.english: A garnish helps to enhance the appearance of any dish.
sentences.chinese: 装饰菜能为任何菜肴增色。

sentences.english: She’s the kind of woman who takes pride in her appearance .
sentences.chinese: 她是那种对自己的外貌感到自豪的女人。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t judge by appearances .
sentences.chinese: 你不该以貌取人。

sentences.english: They work hard at school without giving the appearance of being particularly hard-working.
sentences.chinese: 他们在学校里学习很用功，只是表面上并不显得特别如此。

sentences.english: The case had all the appearances of a straightforward murder.
sentences.chinese: 从所有迹象来看，这个案件都像一宗简单的谋杀。

sentences.english: The pupils looked angelic – but appearances can be deceptive .
sentences.chinese: 这些学生看上去如天使一般，但外表可能是会骗人的。

sentences.english: He was, to all appearances , a respectable, successful businessman.
sentences.chinese: 从各方面看，他都是个体面而成功的商人。

sentences.english: The industry has changed greatly with the appearance of new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 新技术问世后，这一行业出现了天翻地覆的变化。

detailed_translations.english: the way someone or something looks to other people

sentences.english: He noticed a woman in a black dress sitting across from him.
sentences.chinese: 他看到有位黑衣女子坐在他的对面。

sentences.english: I didn’t notice any smoke.
sentences.chinese: 我没注意到有烟。

sentences.english: Have you noticed any change in him?
sentences.chinese: 你注意到他有什么变化了吗？

sentences.english: I waved but they took no notice.
sentences.chinese: 我挥了挥手，可是他们没有注意到。

sentences.english: Firefighters were prepared to rush out at a moment’s notice.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员准备着随时出动。

detailed_translations.english: if you notice something or someone, you realize that they exist, especially because you can see, hear, or feel them
when you notice or pay attention to someone or something

sentences.english: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.chinese: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.english: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.chinese: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.english: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.chinese: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.english: Scott sat down at his desk and turned his attention to the file he had in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.english: As a society we need to give more attention to the needs of older people.
sentences.chinese: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.english: Now he’s gone, I can give you my undivided attention .
sentences.chinese: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.english: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.english: They listened to the speech with close attention .
sentences.chinese: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.english: Attention to detail is essential in this job.
sentences.chinese: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.english: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.chinese: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

detailed_translations.english: when you carefully listen to, look at, or think about someone or something

sentences.english: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.
sentences.chinese: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.english: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.chinese: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.english: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

sentences.english: One of the distinguishing features (= features that are different from other things of the same sort ) of modern banking is its dependence on computers.
sentences.chinese: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.english: It's a great film and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year.
sentences.chinese: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.english: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.chinese: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特征，特色；面貌；特写，专题节目；故事片
detailed_translations.english: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical
When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it

sentences.english: Dave’s a nice guy when you get to know him.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫是个好人，你了解他后就知道了。

sentences.english: Jake’s a real tough guy.
sentences.chinese: 杰克是个很厉害的家伙。

detailed_translations.english: a man

sentences.english: The dominant male gorilla is the largest in the group.
sentences.chinese: 领头的公猩猩是这群大猩猩中体形最大的一个。

sentences.english: Japan became dominant in the mass market during the 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代日本在大众市场上开始占据优势。

sentences.english: its dominant position within the group
sentences.chinese: 它在该组织中的突出地位

detailed_translations.chinese: 显性的；占优势的；支配的，统治的
detailed_translations.english: more powerful, important, or noticeable than other people or things

sentences.english: The main reason for living in Spain is the weather.
sentences.chinese: 居住在西班牙的主要原因是天气。

sentences.english: What do you consider to be the main problem?
sentences.chinese: 你认为最主要的问题是什么？

sentences.english: Our main concern is that the children are safe.
sentences.chinese: 我们最关心的是保证孩子们的安全。

sentences.english: a summary of the main points of the agreement
sentences.chinese: 协议要点的总结

sentences.english: the main aim of the meeting
sentences.chinese: 会议的要旨

sentences.english: I’ll meet you outside the main entrance.
sentences.chinese: 我在大门外等你。

sentences.english: the main bedroom
sentences.chinese: 主卧室

detailed_translations.english: larger or more important than all other things, ideas etc of the same kind

sentences.english: She tried to focus her mind on her work.
sentences.chinese: 她试图集中精神干活。

sentences.english: He focused his blue eyes on her.
sentences.chinese: 他那蓝色的眼睛注视着她。

sentences.english: Eggs became the focus for the food poisoning scare.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋成了食物中毒恐慌的焦点。

detailed_translations.english: to give attention, effort, etc. to one particular subject, situation or person rather than another
the thing, person, situation etc that people pay special attention to

sentences.english: a teaching career
sentences.chinese: 教学事业

sentences.english: He realized that his acting career was over.
sentences.chinese: 他意识到自己的演艺事业已走到了尽头。

sentences.english: a physiotherapist who wanted to make a dramatic career change by becoming an author
sentences.chinese: 想彻底改行当作家的理疗师

sentences.english: Nurses want an improved career structure (= better opportunities to move upwards in their jobs ) .
sentences.chinese: 护士希望有更好的职业架构。

detailed_translations.english: the series of jobs that a person has in a particular area of work, usually involving more responsibility as time passes

sentences.english: a part-time job
sentences.chinese: 兼职工作

sentences.english: women wishing to return to work on a part-time basis
sentences.chinese: 希望以兼职形式重返职场的女性

detailed_translations.english: someone who has a part-time job works for only part of each day or week

sentences.english: Cats have a very acute sense of hearing (= very good, so that they can hear even the smallest sound ) .
sentences.chinese: 猫的听觉非常敏锐。

sentences.english: Employees need the sense of being appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 雇员需要被赏识的感觉。

sentences.english: It was dark and he had completely lost his sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 天黑了，他完全失去了方向感。

sentences.english: This is true in a general sense.
sentences.chinese: 从一般意义上来讲，这是对的。

sentences.english: Perhaps he sensed your distrust.
sentences.chinese: 也许他感觉到了你的不信任。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感官；感觉；理解力；判断力；意义
detailed_translations.english: one of the five natural powers of sight, hearing, feeling, taste, and smell, that give us information about the things around us
if you sense something, you feel that it exists or is true, without being told or having proof

sentences.english: We meet regularly, once a month.
sentences.chinese: 我们定期见面，每月一次。

detailed_translations.english: at the same time each day, week, month etc

sentences.english: The company holds regular meetings with employees.
sentences.chinese: 公司定期召集雇员开会。

sentences.english: His breathing was slow and regular.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸缓慢而均匀。

sentences.english: Trains will run at regular intervals from 11 am to 4 pm.
sentences.chinese: 火车从上午11点到下午4点每隔一定时间开行。

sentences.english: We hear from him on a regular basis .
sentences.chinese: 我们定期收到他的来信。

sentences.english: He phones us every Sunday at six, regular as clockwork (= always at the same time ) .
sentences.chinese: 他每逢星期天6点钟打电话给我们，非常准时。

sentences.english: a regular job
sentences.chinese: 固定的工作

detailed_translations.english: happening every hour, every week, every month etc, usually with the same amount of time in between

sentences.english: The land was returned to its original owner.
sentences.chinese: 这块土地归还给了原主。

sentences.english: The kitchen still has many original features (= parts that were there when the house was first built ).
sentences.chinese: 这间厨房仍保留着当初的许多特点。

sentences.english: the original meaning of the word
sentences.chinese: 这个单词的原意

sentences.english: The original plan was to fly out to New York.
sentences.chinese: 原先的计划是飞往纽约。

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening first, before other people or things

sentences.english: a special place in the classroom for reading
sentences.chinese: 教室里的阅读专区

sentences.english: No one receives special treatment.
sentences.chinese: 没有人享有特殊待遇。

sentences.english: Maria’s special recipe for apple pie
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚的苹果馅饼秘方

sentences.english: The good china was used only on special occasions .
sentences.chinese: 这些精美瓷器只在特殊场合使用。

sentences.english: Each village has its own special charm.
sentences.chinese: 每一座村子都有其独特的魅力。

detailed_translations.english: not ordinary or usual, but different in some way and often better or more important

sentences.english: Despite their different personalities, they became the best of friends.
sentences.chinese: 尽管个性不同，他们还是成了最好的朋友。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, the illness can lead to changes in personality.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，这种病会导致性格变化。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s character, especially the way they behave towards other people

sentences.english: He has a cheerful but quiet character.
sentences.chinese: 他的性格乐观文静。

sentences.english: Everyone recognizes Disney’s cartoon characters.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼的卡通人物尽人皆知。

sentences.english: The whole character of the school has changed.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的特色已经完全变了。

detailed_translations.english: the particular combination of qualities that makes someone a particular type of person

sentences.english: people of the same gender
sentences.chinese: 同性别的人

sentences.english: Discrimination on grounds of race or gender is forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 严禁种族歧视和性别歧视。

sentences.english: There may be gender differences in attitudes to paid work.
sentences.chinese: 对待有偿劳动的态度可能存在着性别差异。

sentences.english: traditional gender roles
sentences.chinese: 传统的性别角色

sentences.english: toys that do not reinforce gender stereotypes
sentences.chinese: 不强化性别模式化观念的玩具

sentences.english: a science fiction story dealing with gender issues
sentences.chinese: 以性别问题为题材的科幻故事

detailed_translations.english: the fact of being male or female

sentences.english: diplomatic/international/foreign relations
sentences.chinese: 外交 / 国际 / 对外关系

sentences.english: a close/near/distant relation of mine
sentences.chinese: 我的一位近亲 / 远亲

detailed_translations.english: the way in which two people, groups or countries behave towards each other or deal with each other

sentences.english: a total ban on cigarette advertising
sentences.chinese: 香烟广告的全面禁止

sentences.english: He looked at her with a total lack of comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 他一头雾水地望着她。

sentences.english: a sport that demands total commitment
sentences.chinese: 需要全身心投入的体育运动

detailed_translations.english: complete, or as great as is possible
to reach a particular total

sentences.english: Kelly’s promotion means more money and more responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 凯利获得提升，这意味着钱多了，责任也更大了。

detailed_translations.english: a duty to be in charge of someone or something, so that you make decisions and can be blamed if something bad happens

sentences.english: The army are helping to clear up after the floods.
sentences.chinese: 陆军部队正协助洪灾后的清理工作。

sentences.english: an army officer
sentences.chinese: 陆军军官

sentences.english: Army units launched attacks on bases near Jounieh port.
sentences.chinese: 陆军部队对朱尼耶港附近的基地发动了进攻。

sentences.english: He joined the army when he was 17.
sentences.chinese: 他17岁参加了陆军。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a country’s military force that is trained to fight on land in a war

sentences.english: a military helicopter
sentences.chinese: 军用直升机

sentences.english: military equipment
sentences.chinese: 军事设备

sentences.english: The government has threatened to take military action if the rebels do not withdraw from the area.
sentences.chinese: 政府警告说，如果叛乱分子不从该地区撤出，就要采取军事行动。

sentences.english: The United States is prepared to use military force to achieve its aims.
sentences.chinese: 美国准备动用武力达成目的。

sentences.english: a raid by European military forces
sentences.chinese: 欧洲军事力量发动的袭击

detailed_translations.english: used by, involving, or relating to the army, navy, or airforce
the military forces of a country

sentences.english: They took a blood sample to test for hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 他们取了血样做肝炎化验。

detailed_translations.english: a small part or amount of something that is examined in order to find out something about the whole

detailed_translations.chinese: 从…抽样； 品尝， 体验
detailed_translations.english: to taste food or drink in order to see what it is like

sentences.english: Native American pottery
sentences.chinese: 美洲印第安人的陶器

detailed_translations.english: objects made out of baked clay

sentences.english: It’s on at the local cinema.
sentences.chinese: 此片正在当地影院上映。

detailed_translations.english: a building in which films are shown

sentences.english: He left school without any qualifications.
sentences.chinese: 他离校时没有拿到任何文凭。
